name: Werewolf Berserker
description: Transform into a beast, fearing nearby enemies for 3 seconds.   While transformed, your Light Attacks apply a bleed for 3716 Bleed Damage over 4 seconds, your Heavy Attacks deal 50% splash damage, and your Max Stamina is increased by 30%.  While slotted, your Stamina Recovery is increased by 15%.
effectLines: Augments your Light Attacks to gain a bleed, and your Heavy Attacks deal damage in a cone in front of you.
coefDescription: CRIMINAL ACT Transform into a beast, fearing nearby enemies for 3 seconds.   While transformed, your Light Attacks apply a bleed for $1 Bleed Damage over 4 seconds, your Heavy Attacks deal 50% splash damage, and your Max Stamina is increased by 30%.  While slotted, your Stamina Recovery is increased by 15%.
